I recently reset my pc, and I still had files from steam before I reset my pc on another drive. I installed steam after I reset my pc and loaded up the Dead By Daylight from the files on my other drive before I reset my pc. It loaded up easy anti cheat and then stopped. The game is now removed from my library, but when i go to store it says in library? I click play now from the store page and it says preparing Dead by Daylight, but it never opens the game. I tried launching the game from Geforce Now as well but it didnt even work then its like it is completely gone from my library? Please Help | Thanks
游戏是好游戏，问题今天一大早上线准备开搞发现游戏进不去了？难受的一匹，赶快搞好啊！！

Queria mesmo é ver o chuck quebrando pallets ou o pennywase vindo que nem um bixo piruleta com aquela boca de tubarão, enfim, o jogo é bom, muita diversão (principalmente com o myers) vale a pena seu tempo,
那些说进不去的，steam设置——下载——清除下载缓存——重新登录steam，就可以进去了。

This games a blast, especially with friends! If you play with friends you get access to all the perks and if you play online of course you'll have to earn the perks. I mostly played with friends and really enjoyed taunting my friends while hunting them down. Compatible with console controllers, I recommend the tutorial before jumping into a game, but the game controls are consistent and smooth once you get them down. The game has a wide range of monsters to pick from and a decent assortment of survivor characters, without making extra in game purchases. It's definitely easier to play as a survivor as far as game mechanics, but the hunter tends to have the advantage. The hunter mechanics, I personally think, are best learned with lots of practice and maybe a friend willing to practice them on. After you master it, you'll probably toy with the survivors more then hunt and kill them, because why not, it's fun!
Hola AYUDA POR FAVOR, el juego ya lo compré y me aparece que lo vuelva a comprar, lo desinstalé para ver si se podía solucionar el problema y ahora no me aparece en la biblioteca :(

This game definitely has its flaws.

However, I am very biased and I am prone to really overlook these issues. It definitely could be better, and it definitely should be in most departments, but I don't mind. I'm content. I'm just immune to some of the complaints people usually have.

I love it. It's flawed. I try to support the devs as much as possible. I appreciate what this game is, and what its future holds in store.

I'll be playing this game until its server's shut down - and let's hope this won't be for many years to come.

GL&HF <3
